hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a #single Upgrade Deku Scrub#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nut Capacity#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Bomb Bag# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Sun's Song#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fairy Bottle#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.
